item.title: Agent-to-Sim: Learning Interactive Behavior Models from Casual Longitudinal Videos
item.description: Agent-to-Sim (ATS) learns realistic 3D agent behaviors from casual videos by reconstructing a persistent 4D representation and training a generative model, enabling real-to-sim transfer for interactiv…

item.title: Alchemy: Amplifying Theorem-Proving Capability through Symbolic Mutation
item.description: Alchemy: A novel framework synthesizes formal theorems via symbolic mutation, significantly enhancing large language model theorem-proving performance.

item.title: AutoTrain: No-code training for state-of-the-art models
item.description: AutoTrain: a no-code open-source library simplifies state-of-the-art model training for various tasks, democratizing AI development.

item.title: CompassJudger-1: All-in-one Judge Model Helps Model Evaluation and Evolution
item.description: CompassJudger-1: The first all-in-one open-source judge LLM for versatile and robust evaluation of large language models, improving efficiency and reproducibility.

item.title: FrugalNeRF: Fast Convergence for Few-shot Novel View Synthesis without Learned Priors
item.description: FrugalNeRF achieves fast, high-fidelity 3D scene reconstruction from limited views without relying on pre-trained models, significantly reducing training time.

item.title: Pangea: A Fully Open Multilingual Multimodal LLM for 39 Languages
item.description: PANGEA: A fully open multilingual, multimodal LLM outperforms existing models across diverse languages and cultural contexts.

item.title: Pre-training Distillation for Large Language Models: A Design Space Exploration
item.description: Boosting LLMs’ performance, this study systematically explores pre-training distillation, optimizing key aspects and revealing that larger student models significantly benefit from this technique.

item.title: RM-Bench: Benchmarking Reward Models of Language Models with Subtlety and Style
item.description: RM-BENCH, a new benchmark, rigorously evaluates reward models’ sensitivity to subtle content and style, revealing significant room for improvement in current models and highlighting the importance of …

item.title: SAM2Long: Enhancing SAM 2 for Long Video Segmentation with a Training-Free Memory Tree
item.description: SAM2Long dramatically improves long-video object segmentation by using a training-free memory tree, resolving error accumulation and achieving state-of-the-art results on various benchmarks.

item.title: Selecting Influential Samples for Long Context Alignment via Homologous Models' Guidance and Contextual Awareness Measurement
item.description: GATEAU: Improve LLM long-context alignment by cleverly selecting influential training samples using Homologous Models’ Guidance and Contextual Awareness Measurement.

item.title: Hallucination Detox: Sensitive Neuron Dropout (SeND) for Large Language Model Training
item.description: New training method, SeND, reduces large language model hallucinations by up to 40% by selectively dropping unreliable neurons during training, improving accuracy and efficiency.

item.title: Ichigo: Mixed-Modal Early-Fusion Realtime Voice Assistant
item.description: Ichigo: a real-time voice assistant fusing speech & text via a unified transformer, achieving state-of-the-art performance with 111ms latency!

item.title: Baichuan Alignment Technical Report
item.description: Baichuan Alignment significantly boosts large language model performance via refined training, superior data strategies, enhanced capabilities, and rigorous evaluation, achieving up to 28% user experi…

item.title: DM-Codec: Distilling Multimodal Representations for Speech Tokenization
item.description: DM-Codec, a novel speech tokenizer, uses distillation to integrate acoustic, semantic, and contextual information, significantly improving speech tokenization accuracy.

item.title: How Many Van Goghs Does It Take to Van Gogh? Finding the Imitation Threshold
item.description: Researchers discover text-to-image models start reliably imitating concepts from training data after seeing 200-600 examples, offering crucial insights for copyright and privacy.

item.title: CBT-Bench: Evaluating Large Language Models on Assisting Cognitive Behavior Therapy
item.description: New CBT-BENCH benchmark rigorously evaluates LLMs’ potential in assisting Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, revealing strengths and limitations.

item.title: Cross-Lingual Auto Evaluation for Assessing Multilingual LLMs
item.description: CIA Suite enables reliable multilingual LLM evaluation by training an evaluator LLM on English references, achieving human-level performance across diverse languages.

item.title: In-context learning and Occam's razor
item.description: In-context learning implicitly minimizes model complexity and training error, aligning with Occam’s Razor, thus improving generalization, especially in data-scarce scenarios.

item.title: PUMA: Empowering Unified MLLM with Multi-granular Visual Generation
item.description: PUMA: A unified MLLM mastering diverse image generation & understanding through multi-granular visual features, balancing diversity and controllability.

item.title: Router-Tuning: A Simple and Effective Approach for Enabling Dynamic-Depth in Transformers
item.description: Router-Tuning and MindSkip revolutionize Transformers: dynamic depth is achieved via efficient router fine-tuning, boosting speed and cutting training costs without compromising accuracy.

item.title: SemiEvol: Semi-supervised Fine-tuning for LLM Adaptation
item.description: SEMIEVOL boosts LLM performance by cleverly combining labeled and unlabeled data using a two-stage knowledge propagation and selection approach, achieving significant improvements across diverse tasks…

item.title: Meta-Chunking: Learning Efficient Text Segmentation via Logical Perception
item.description: Meta-Chunking boosts RAG performance by intelligently segmenting text into logically coherent chunks using LLMs, improving efficiency and accuracy.
